benchmark_details.name: DianJin-R1 (DianJin-R1: Evaluating and Enhancing Financial Reasoning in Large Language Models)
benchmark_details.overview: DianJin-R1 introduces a reasoning-enhanced framework and a high-quality dataset, DianJin-R1-Data, constructed from CFLUE, FinQA, and a proprietary compliance corpus to enhance financial reasoning in large language models (LLMs).

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance financial reasoning capabilities in LLMs through structured supervision and reinforcement learning.

data.source: Constructed from CFLUE, FinQA, and a proprietary compliance corpus (CCC).
data.size: 38,638 multiple-choice questions from CFLUE, 8,281 financial question-answer pairs from FinQA, and 1,800 dialogues from CCC.
data.format: Structured text format with <think> and <answer> tags.
data.annotation: Manual verification using GPT-4o to ensure alignment between generated answers and reasoning steps.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is defined as the proportion of correctly answered questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy implies better reasoning capability in models.
methodology.validation: Evaluated on benchmarks including CFLUE, FinQA, and CCC.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Open-sourced except for sensitive CCC scenario data.
